Question
========

Which of the following is a discrete random variable? 

Answerlist
----------

* The amount of rainfall in a given day.  
* The number of coin tosses until we observe heads.  
* The time taken for a car to travel between two cities.  
* The height of a randomly chosen student. 

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Continuous
* Yes, this will be an integer count, so it is discrete. It could be a very
  very large number though!
* This is a variable that could be recorded with infinite precision. It is
  continuous.
* This is also continuous.
